    • Method Detail

      • regularRefreshToken

        @ResponseStatus(value=OK)
 @RequestMapping(value="regular",
                method=POST)
public be.ugent.vopro5.backend.businesslayer.applicationfacade.auth.RefreshTokenController.RefreshTokenResponse regularRefreshToken(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             be.ugent.vopro5.backend.businesslayer.applicationfacade.auth.RefreshTokenController.EmailPasswordBody body)
        Parameters:
        body - The body contains the email and password of a person who wishes to log into the system.
        Returns:
        A refresh-token is returned when the email and password are authorized. The obtained refresh-token can then be used to receive an access-token.

      • facebookRefreshToken

        @RequestMapping(value="facebook",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<be.ugent.vopro5.backend.businesslayer.applicationfacade.auth.RefreshTokenController.RefreshTokenResponse> facebookRefreshToken(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             be.ugent.vopro5.backend.businesslayer.applicationfacade.auth.RefreshTokenController.OAuthClientBody body)
        Parameters:
        body - Contains data to initiate the auth flow for facebook.
        Returns:
        A refresh-token that can be used to obtain an access-token.

      • googleRefreshToken

        @RequestMapping(value="google",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<be.ugent.vopro5.backend.businesslayer.applicationfacade.auth.RefreshTokenController.RefreshTokenResponse> googleRefreshToken(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         be.ugent.vopro5.backend.businesslayer.applicationfacade.auth.RefreshTokenController.OAuthClientBody body)
        Parameters:
        body - Contains the data used to to initiate the auth flow for google.
        Returns:
        A refresh-token that can be used to obtain an access-token.
